title: Vuelta a España Stage 4: Primož Roglič Strikes For Stage Win, Red Jersey in Bruising Mountaintop Battle
content:
Roglič sprints into eight-second GC lead atop the gruesome Pico Villuercas summit as GC explodes in first climbing test of La Vuelta.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Stage 4: Primož Roglič Strikes For Stage Win, Red Jersey in Bruising Mountaintop Battle on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
